long_description: The extra-large Edelrid Cosmic Twist Chalk Bag holds lots of chalk (sold separately) for long days of summertime rock climbing. Nylon exterior features a fleece-lined chalk reservoir that holds plenty of powder. Drawcord closure keeps chalk from spilling out while not in use. Elastic loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. The Edelrid Cosmic Twist Chalk Bag comes with a nylon webbing belt that adjusts easily.
short_description: The extra-large Edelrid Cosmic Twist Chalk Bag holds lots of chalk (sold separately) for long days of summertime rock climbing.
